name: Trapped in Chaos
description:
Controls:

A: Move Left

D: Move Right

W: Jump

Scroll: Change Characters (From Level 2)

Left Click: Shoot (From Level 3)

(I uploaded a web build, but it was facing an issue while loading! Kindly download the PC version)

Brackey's Game Jam 2021.2 Submission.

Game Development: Athul John (noobiedev)

Character Design: Kiran S Baliga (rougueburger21)

Credits:

Music : Youtube Audio Library (Music ⓒ - Audionautix)

Sound Effects: soundbible.com (Mike Koenig)

Characters inspired from Marvel Cinematic Universe.
